basics.name: Community Outreach Specialist
basics.label: Education Professional
basics.summary: Dynamic professional driven to fostering love of learning and ensuring leadership skills within people so they may reach their full potential.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Liaison for Junior Board which entails board management by providing direction and leadership to young board members wanting to serve their community. Responsible for providing relevant and interesting content for social media, newsletter and website; in addition created organization brochures and secured larger-scale marketing with partnerships.
highlights: Increased mentor retention by over 50% in 9 months by developing and executing strategic volunteer engagement plan
Managed all aspects of potential intern and mentor interviews
Developed and posted job descriptions for Internships and Program Leaders;

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Planned all aspects of Exceed 4 day Intensive retreat in Payson for mentors and mentees
highlights: Developed and maintained strong partnerships with high school administrators and counselors, mentors and student mentees to promote and grow a shared vision of the Exceed Mentoring Program
Implemented strategic program plan for recruiting new mentees and on-boarding new mentors, also directing workload of Program Assistant

work.name: Arizona State University
work.summary: Developed innovative and relevant course plans using Core Curriculum Standards to increase student engagement
highlights: Served on District Curriculum Planning Committee as Spanish Department Representative
Responsible for administrative duties such as filing, grade entry, data analysis and student evaluation
